ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Grobb Cleaver or bust?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, it ll only cost you about 12,000pp.  Seriously, that s out of line at 26th level unless you have a really good primary char or crazy
ygData.messageBody:
> Chip O'Brien wrote:
>
> From: Chip O'Brien <cobrien@...>
>
> I recommend a Mith 2h sword. I don't have one (I have a reaver) but
> the Haste effect I heard about was good.
>

Yeah, it'll only cost you about 12,000pp. Seriously, that's out of
line at 26th level unless you have a really good primary char or crazy
guildmates/friends.

At 26th I'd get a BIBS from Runnyeye (or buy for about 300-400pp) or
a Gigantic Zweihander (from everfrost). If you are on an older server,
you can likely pick up a Dark Reaver for pp long before you could
ever get it yourself, the demand isn't there, so the price is lower
than the item is worth to us.

I find it hard to believe someone would own a Mith 2H before level 35.
I got mine at 40, through trading.

Xilith
